title: "General analysis notebook for `forward` budget models."
output: html_notebook
---

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
library(readr)

normalize <- function(x) {
    return ((x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x)))
}
```

# Load and process

```{r, message=FALSE}
name <- "../data/exp28_d-0.2e-3_f12.csv"
results <- read_csv(paste(name, sep=""))
```

```{r, fig.width=2.5, fig.height=1.5}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=variances)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) + 
  xlab("Variance") +
  theme_classic() -> p1

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=errors)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) + 
  xlab("Error") +
  theme_classic() -> p2

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  xlab("Vc (volt)") +
  theme_classic() -> p3

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_comp)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  xlab("Vo (volt)") +
  theme_classic() -> p4

grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, nrow=2)
```


```{r, fig.width=2.5, fig.height=1}
results %>% 
  # filter(errors < 0.6, coincidence_count > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc, y=V_comp, color=As)) +
  geom_point() + 
  theme_classic()
```

```{r, fig.width=2.5, fig.height=1}
results %>% 
  # filter(errors < 0.6, coincidence_count > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc, y=errors)) +
  geom_point() + 
  theme_classic()
```

```{r, fig.width=2.5, fig.height=1}
results %>% 
  # filter(errors < 0.6, coincidence_count > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc, y=variances)) +
  geom_point() + 
  theme_classic()
```


```{r, fig.width=1.5, fig.height=1}
results %>% 
  # filter(errors < 0.6, coincidence_count > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc, y=normalize(variances))) +
  geom_point(color="red", alpha=0.5) + 
  xlab("Vo (mvolt)") +
  ylab("Rel. scores (AU)") +
  geom_point(aes(x=V_osc, y=normalize(errors)), color="purple") + 
  theme_classic()
```
```{r, fig.width=1.5, fig.height=1}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=1e3*V_free, y=normalize(variances))) +
  geom_smooth(method = "glm",  method.args = list(family = "binomial"), color="red3", alpha=0.5, se=FALSE, linetype="dashed") + 
  # geom_point(color="red3", alpha=0.2) + 
  geom_smooth(aes(x=1e3*V_free, y=normalize(errors)), 
              method = "glm",  method.args = list(family = "binomial"), color="mediumpurple", se=FALSE,linetype="dashed") + 
  # geom_point(aes(x=1e3*V_free, y=normalize(errors)), color="mediumpurple", alpha=0.2) + 
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = mean(1e3*V_free)), color="black") +
  xlab("Vf (mvolt)") +
  ylab("Normalized") +
  theme_classic() 
```
